thread.title: Great location and amenities
thread.title_full: Great location and amenities - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mabelsophie
title: Great location and amenities
text:
A perfect location for a theater weekend just far enough from Times Square. Hotel staff are extremely helpful and friendly. Terrific room amenities such as Moulton Brown bath products, comfy bathrobes and a great minibar treats. The guest happy hour gets bonus points.
Room Tip: If possible, upgrade to a King. See more room tips
